original_title: Dr. Ava's How to Please a Woman
overview: The secrets to arousing and pleasing a woman! Dr. Ava guides you through live demonstrations of the four essential phases of pleasing a woman. You'll learn how to satisfy her emotionally, physically, sexually, and even after lovemaking. Brush up on how to create a romantic atmosphere and get her into the mood for sex. Discover sensual foreplay techniques, oral sex tips, and many orgasmic sexual positions. Explore and stimulate her G-spot, A-spot, and U-spot!
title: Dr. Ava's How to Please a Woman
